name: filter_vcf_with_bedfile_v1.2.0
title: filter_vcf_with_bedfile_v1.2.0
summary: v1.2.0 - Filters a VCF file using a BED file and various quality filters - keeps variants overlapping/within the region of interest. Outputs both BED+quality filtered and quality-only filtered VCFs. Runs bcftools v1.13

inputSpec.name: vcf_file
inputSpec.label: Input vcf file
inputSpec.help: The vcf file to be filtered

inputSpec.name: vcf_index
inputSpec.label: Input vcf index file
inputSpec.help: The index file of the vcf file to be filtered

inputSpec.name: bedfile
inputSpec.label: bedfile to filter vcf
inputSpec.help: The bedfile you wish to use to filter the vcf file with

outputSpec.name: filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: BED filtered + quality filtered VCF
outputSpec.help: A vcf file containing variants from vcf that fall within the regions given in the bed file and pass quality filters.

outputSpec.name: quality_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Quality filtered VCF (genome-wide)
outputSpec.help: A vcf file containing variants that pass quality filters but without BED file region restriction.
